results.title: Glass slide magic lantern
results.brief_description:
Glass slide projector as used by Department of Agriculture, Melbourne.
Lens can be compacted or extended, see attached images from ICS.
Modifications include addition of electricity and edision bulb.
1 Box containing 2 parts.

results.title: The Story of the toy soldier
results.creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Magic ball”
Sam is playing with his tin soldiers. While placing them in lines, he notices that one of his soldiers keeps falling over. Sam is perplexed, so the magic ball takes him to a parade ground where the soldiers are being drilled by a sergeant and a corporal.

results.title: The Story of the six winged lions
results.creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Magic ball”
Sam looks at a Chinese plate. The picture shows somone big, helped by six winged lions, to bully a smaller person. Sam decides to use the power of the magic ball, and do something about it.

results.title: The Story of the pirates
results.creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Magic ball”
Presents a fantasy about a boy who is transported to the high seas by a magic ball. Shows how he joins with an old fisherman in foiling the attempts of a group of pirates to bury their treasure. For primary grades.

results.title: The Story of the grandfather clock
results.creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Magic ball”
Sam noticed that the grandfather clock had stopped. The magic ball made him very small and he went through the keyhole of the clock. There he saw people.

results.title: The Story of the cowboy and the indian
results.creator_credit: Brian Cosgrove and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Magic ball”
Sam is reading a story about the Wild West. He enjoys it so much, the magic ball takes him back so he can meet cowboys and indians.

results.title: Tina Turner in Coober Pedy
results.brief_description: “I love listening to music while I’m working, and the music gives me ideas for the pictures. I might be listening to Tina Turner and that reminds me of when Tina was in the movie Mad Max 3 in the sparkly silver dress. Mad Max is filmed in the Outback and looks just like Indulkana, so I start thinking about what it might be like if Tina came to my community.” -Kaylene Whiskey
results.description: “I love listening to music while I’m working, and the music gives me ideas for the pictures. I might be listening to Tina Turner and that reminds me of when Tina was in the movie Mad Max 3 in the sparkly silver dress. Mad Max: Fury Road
group_siblings.creator_credit: George Miller

results.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
results.brief_description: George Miller’s Mad Max revolutionised movies when it tore through cinemas in 1979. Bursting with stunning practical effects, explosive set pieces and iconic costumes, the original Mad Max trilogy (1979-85) cemented its place in pop culture before roaring back to life 30 years later.

constellations_other.name: Outlaws and the end
constellations_other.description: Tracing connections from Sweet Country to Australian westerns and resistance to white colonial narratives.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

constellations_other.name: Storyboards to Academy Awards
constellations_other.description: Storyboards allow filmmakers, showrunners and game designers to visualise and communicate how their stories will look on-screen.

results.description:
Tom Hardy takes the Mad Max baton in this gloriously insane action film that explodes new life into the series and redefines the action genre. Along for the ride is Charlize Theron, who proves her action credentials and whose character, the fierce Imperator Furiosa, has branded herself into popular psyche and culture alike.

After years in the making George Miller set a bomb under contemporary actions films, abandoning overused CGI for insane practical effects and stunts that thrilled audiences worldwide. Essentially one long furious chase, Fury Road still manages to pack an emotional and visceral wallop and is a surprising feminist parable to boot. Miller essentially handed budding filmmakers a masterclass on action cinema with this one of a kind experience.
description_for_label:
Tom Hardy takes the Mad Max baton in this gloriously insane action film that explodes new life into the series and redefines the action genre. Along for the ride is Charlize Theron, who proves her action credentials and whose character, the fierce Imperator Furiosa, has branded herself into popular psyche and culture alike.

After years in the making George Miller set a bomb under contemporary actions films, abandoning overused CGI for insane practical effects and stunts that thrilled audiences worldwide. Essentially one long furious chase, Fury Road still manages to pack an emotional and visceral wallop and is a surprising feminist parable to boot. Miller essentially handed budding filmmakers a masterclass on action cinema with this one of a kind experience.
